title: My Dream Job Analysis
short_summary: Structured analysis of target roles, skills, and career positioning strategy
summary: Career strategy and analytics project focused on defining an ideal role profile, identifying skill gaps, and aligning technical and domain experience with long-term professional goals. Combines structured reasoning with documented analysis to guide portfolio development and job targeting.

datasets.dataset_value: Dream job role criteria and skill mapping notes

components.name: My Dream Job by Region
components.objective: Identify high-viability U.S. regions for Supply Chain Analyst roles by comparing economic strength and industry concentration across Consumer Staples, Industrials, and Information Technology.
components.business_value: Improves job targeting efficiency by prioritizing regions where supply chain roles align with strong economic indicators and resilient industry demand.

components.name: My Dream Job by Industry
components.objective: Evaluate industry stability for Supply Chain Analyst career paths using profitability, growth, and financial health benchmarks across major sectors.
components.business_value: Reduces career risk by identifying industries with stronger long-term stability signals, improving alignment between target roles and durable market demand.

components.name: My Dream Job by Company
components.objective: Identify top Consumer Staples employers in IL/VA by comparing profitability, efficiency, and competitive positioning using a profit frontier approach.
components.business_value: Improves employer targeting by narrowing the search to firms that combine strong financial performance with favorable operating profiles in the selected regions.
